member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY
member.summary: Contains the error message or message box display text for a message table resource.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY structure.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY.Flags
member.summary: Indicates that the string is encoded in Unicode, if equal to the value 0x0001. Indicates that the string is encoded in ANSI, if equal to the value 0x0000.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY.Text
member.summary: Pointer to an array that contains the error message or message box display text.
